files.patch:
@@ -273,0 +273,2 @@

+    TAR_TYPE="busybox"
@@ -284,1 +286,1 @@

+    # that need to be archived or extracted
@@ -287,0 +289,3 @@

+    TAR_INCLUDE_PARAM="T"
+    TAR_SUPPORTS_TRANSFORM="false"
